name: Dream Tape
description:
Dream Tape is a psychological, atmospheric horror game that puts the player inside strange and bizarre situations. Each episode explores a different kind of horror, offering a unique experience for each tapes.

Explore and unravel the mystery of these tapes and you shall find the answer.

Features:

  • Atmospheric and mysterious environment for immersion
  • PS1-styled graphics
  • Unique gameplay for each tapes
